name: Sippin Hot Blickety Block N Bop Those Bad Battle Boys Down To Size Supreme
name_original: Sippin Hot Blickety Block N Bop Those Bad Battle Boys Down To Size Supreme
description:
Fly High and Don't Die

  • Defeat your enemies by flying higher
  • Survive as long as you can against an endless parade of enemies
  • Careful! The floor is lava

Get the High Score!

  • Collect coins that enemies drop
  • Perform skill shot maneuvers for maximum gains
  • Earn keys to unlock playable characters

Features

  • 🎮 5 playable characters
  • 🕑 2 hours of endless gameplay
  • 🏆 12 steam achievements
  • 🎨 Hand animated, hand crafted sound fx, original soundtrack
